posts.postBody:
TOOT BOOT posted:

iPad hang isn't fixed, had it happen twice in 20min post update.
It's being worked on :ohdear:

myron cope fucked around with this message at May 24, 2012 around 14:14

TOOT BOOT posted:

iPad hang isn't fixed, had it happen twice in 20min post update.

See:

OHIO posted:

We're actively working on the 'requests fail after a certain period of time' issue, it's our top priority and we're on it.

Are there any plans to add PM functionality? Being able to view profiles would be great, too.
I haven't had the hang up on my iPod yet so feeling good about this.

While I do have the loading problem pop up here and there, I have to say I also have been having a lot of connection problems with Pandora as well. Sometimes I just can't get it to start a song and have to force quit once or twice.

myron cope posted:

It's being worked on :ohdear:

My bad I thought iPad refresh fault meant the hang bug.

I opened the updated app and clicked a thread in my bookmarks and the app crashed. I started it up again and cleared my data and it's been fine since. iPhone 4S w/ iOS5.1

But I'm updating to 5.1.1 now. :ohdear:

hardstyle posted:

Hey, quick interest check. I was thinking of making the app support retina versions of emoticons. This would of course require people making them, so I'm just wondering if this is worthwhile.
While I wouldn't say no if they magically sprang into being, there's an absolute shitton of really awful, mostly animated emoticons that are basically never used. :tubular: :punto: :russo: :forkbomb:

I personally think it's not worth the time for something that is just glanced at and takes up less than 1% of the screen in any case. But if you feel like redrawing all of this shit then be my guest! Or just doing the popular ones and being constantly barraged by requests from whoever still uses :zaeed:

This post was an excuse for me to use the most shitty emoticons I could find, what a wild ride!

Also loving that it now starts up on Bookmarks as desired, thanks guys!

Edit: However, what if we got GameCenter integration with a whole bunch of stupid forums-related achievements? Now that's a dumb project that could have legs :D

TACD fucked around with this message at May 24, 2012 around 20:00

I don't see it on the github issue tracker, but I'm not sure if I'm just missing it. But I'm getting the posting errors somewhat regularly. It posts some HTML escape code looking things that are chinese characters or something (I really sound dumb because I have no idea what they are) and the post/everything after it become unreadable in Awful.

It's similar to what withak posted on page 8 (which is now edited anyway) but happens when I'm not even quoting, just replying. I'll take a screenshot of the characters next time, but I have one of the post not loading:
http://i.imgur.com/g98hml.png

I don't know if it's the same as issue 66 or not though.
Haha, is it deliberate that the original Asia tag said "Japan", and the Awful one says "scary"?

Since the last update I no longer have a refresh button whenever I view a forum. Is its exclusion intentional?

Also, the 'First Visible Tab' feature has always given me trouble. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't. Any idea why that might be?

Abel Wingnut posted:

Since the last update I no longer have a refresh button whenever I view a forum. Is its exclusion intentional?

Also, the 'First Visible Tab' feature has always given me trouble. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't. Any idea why that might be?

Pull to refresh for the forums is enabled.

Also have you updated? The first visible tab was fixed for me with the newest update.

I updated a day or two ago. I'll keep tabs on the First Visible issue.

And thanks for the 'Refresh' help. I had no idea.
Test post with different networking library.,.

Oceanbound posted:

Haha, is it deliberate that the original Asia tag said "Japan", and the Awful one says "scary"?

Hah well about this. I had no idea what the original said and was rushing to get it in the release, so I was in google translate trying to figure it out. Then I gave up and I thinks died to type "Awful" in there.

Any chance you can post the characters and I'll change it.

So there's still one guy in the CD general chat thread (username is echoplex) whose posts cause the whole thread after him to become struck through. I quoted him just to see what he was posting, and for some reason his posts always end with an open AND CLOSED strike through tag. Why would a closed tag keep going? It also happens if someone quotes him. Any ideas?
He's trying to submit his posts with Ctrl+S.

Few thread label source images:

LAN-NE: it's supposed to be the dunkin donuts logo but says "north east"

http://i.imgur.com/qeapj.jpg

Ray Parlour thread labels:

RP-league: http://i.imgur.com/frmZE.png

TACD posted:

Edit: However, what if we got GameCenter integration with a whole bunch of stupid forums-related achievements? Now that's a dumb project that could have legs :D
